Title: The smell of spring is strong along the banks of the Xiangyang Canal
Designer: Jiangsu Provincial “May Seven” Cadre School Creative Group (江苏省“五。七”干部学校创作组)
Publisher: Jiangsu renmin chubanshe (江苏人民出版社)
Notes: The Xiangyang Canal is also known as the Hundred-Li Canal, located in Hubei Province. It was added to the World Heritage Irrigation Structures list by the International Commission on Irrigation and Drainage in 2018.
